Text:
I forgot to put it in the description...  This .rar contains 3 .iso's.

#1 - Xandros HEP --> Installation disk

#2 - Xandros HEP - Apps --> Above-mentioned applications disk

#3 - Xandros HEP - Versora -->  Some desktop theme... I dunno, it came with the package so I figured I'd throw it in as well.
